samples.question: [Transcript chunk 2]
samples.transcript: Based on teachers what kind of teachers you like best I like teachers who are friendly and have patients who do not get mad at me when I do not understand anything and who have depth of knowledge about the subject and have a good communication skills to teach well okay who was your favorite teacher when you were quite Young when I was young Mrs Neha was my favorite teacher she used to teach me science and she was always kind and encouraged I remember I used to be a very big in science but she taught us so well that science become my favorite subject would you want to be a teacher in the future yes definitely I want to be a teacher in the future because I think I have a patience and being a teacher is a lucrative professional nowadays have you ever had bad teacher before no I have I never had a bad teachers in my life all of my teachers are have been very nice great okay now a few questions will be based on text messaging do you like texting yes I prefer texting a lot because it is my favorite part and it gives me a lot of time to chat with other persons and also improve my skills typing skills okay Aman do you prefer sending or receiving messages well I do not have any specific preference so if people send me messages I do not mind but I send messages whenever it is necessary do you use any apps to write text there are so many apps which are we use on daily basis like WhatsApp Instagram and Facebook it is for personal choose but for professional choice I use a Skype team jewels in what circumstances is making a phone call better than.

samples.question: Do you think it is important to do things well?

samples.question: So niman do you think old and young people can live together easily?
samples.transcript: In my opinion, I would say no because I have seen a cultural and a lot of more differences in the mentality as well. So as long as they are separated, they would have the barrier of the age gap which we can say that they are having right now. And on the other side, I have seen people living together as well. So, it really depends on their families and the group of people which are living together. >> Mhm. Okay.
samples.transcript_original: In my opinion, I would say no because uh I've seen a cultural and uh a lot of more differences um in the mentality as well. So as long as um they are separated, they would uh have the barrier of um the age gap which we can say that they are having right now. And on the other side, I've seen people living uh together as well. So, it really depends on their families and the group of people which are living together. >> Mhm. Okay.
samples.transcript_cleaned: In my opinion, I would say no because I have seen a cultural and a lot of more differences in the mentality as well. So as long as they are separated, they would have the barrier of the age gap which we can say that they are having right now. And on the other side, I have seen people living together as well. So, it really depends on their families and the group of people which are living together. >> Mhm.

samples.question: How do older people and young younger people usually spend their time together in your country?

samples.question: How often do you take a break during the day?
